content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, as I said, I am a greedy and petty landlord. I am interested in renting out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate the price. Please, make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position as a landlord but as a smart and responsible student, I prefer a reasonable rate. With the city center location and the apartment's condition, I'd like to propose a rental price of 450 Euros a month as my starting point.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am a greedy and petty landlord, and 450 Euros a month is not enough for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering your expectations as a landlord and the benefits of living in the city center, I suggest a revised offer of 500 Euros a month, which still remains reasonable for a student like me. I hope this meets your expectations partially.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am a greedy and petty landlord, and 500 Euros a month is still not enough. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I understand your position as a landlord, as a student, affording a much higher rent might become challenging for me. In light of this, I'll have to propose one final offer of 525 Euros a month, which already represents a considerable increase from my initial suggestion. I hope this compromise can help us reach an agreement. If not, I'll have to reconsider my options.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am a greedy and petty landlord, and 525 Euros a month is still not enough. However, considering your situation as a student, I am willing to accept 550 Euros a month. This is my final offer. 'I agree to the price of [550] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my final comfortable offer of 525 Euros was not accepted. However, as a student, I understand the need to compromise, and thus I agree to the 550 Euros rental price for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
